span.span: Describes base functionality common to both file references and assembly references.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal abstract string SortName { get; }
Protected Friend MustOverride ReadOnly Property SortName As String
protected public: abstract property System::String ^ SortName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，該值用來排序應用程式資訊清單中的參考組件。

span.span: Gets a value that is used to sort the referenced assemblies in the application manifest.
The name to sort by.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性用來排序應用程式資訊清單中參考的組件。This property is used to sort the referenced assemblies in the application manifest. 資訊清單會列出以字母順序的必要組件第一次，後面接著字母順序的已安裝組件。The manifest lists prerequisite assemblies in alphabetical order first, followed by installed assemblies in alphabetical order. 組件的排序根據的參考。The assemblies are sorted according to the of the reference.
